document.full_text: when israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu addresses congress on tuesday, many will be watching to see whether he escalates a war of words with the white house over how to make peace in the middle east.
document.title: netanyahu speech to congress eyed for sign of u.s.-israel rift
lines_and_colors: when israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu addresses congress on tuesday, many will be watching to see whether he escalates a war of words with the white house over how to make peace in the middle east.
